tasks.task: Implement comprehensive system integration and end-to-end testing
tasks.requirements: Create comprehensive end-to-end integration tests covering all system components. Include ritual submission flow, AI validation, blockchain integration, IPFS storage, and community features. Achieve 100% integration coverage with automated testing pipeline.

tasks.task: Create advanced AI orchestration with multi-agent collaboration
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced multi-agent AI orchestration system that coordinates multiple AI models for complex ritual validation. Include agent communication protocols, consensus mechanisms, and dynamic task allocation. Support real-time collaboration between different AI providers.

tasks.task: Implement global community launch and adoption platform
tasks.requirements: Create comprehensive community launch platform with user onboarding, community building tools, and adoption metrics. Include gamification, social features, community challenges, and global outreach programs. Support multi-language community engagement.

tasks.task: Create advanced security framework with zero-trust architecture
tasks.requirements: Implement zero-trust security framework with advanced threat detection, continuous monitoring, and automated response. Include behavioral analysis, anomaly detection, and real-time security orchestration. Support compliance with international security standards.

Create comprehensive ecosystem integration service connecting with external platforms, APIs, and services. Include social media integration, third-party authentication, data synchronization, and cross-platform compatibility. Support seamless user experience across all platforms.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual analytics and predictive modeling
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced predictive analytics service using machine learning for ritual trends, cultural impact prediction, and community behavior analysis. Include time series analysis, pattern recognition, and automated insights generation. Support real-time predictive modeling.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual automation and workflow optimization
tasks.requirements: Create advanced ritual automation service with intelligent workflow optimization, automated validation, and smart routing. Include process automation, decision trees, and adaptive workflows. Support complex ritual processing and optimization.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual personalization and adaptive interfaces
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced adaptive interface system that personalizes ritual submission and viewing experiences. Include user preference learning, contextual adaptation, and intelligent UI optimization. Support accessibility and inclusive design.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual validation with cultural intelligence
tasks.requirements: Create advanced cultural intelligence service for sophisticated ritual validation. Include cultural context understanding, regional adaptation, and intelligent validation algorithms. Support cultural sensitivity and inclusive validation.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual marketplace with DeFi integration
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced ritual marketplace with comprehensive DeFi integration, yield farming, and liquidity pools. Include ritual tokenization, staking mechanisms, and automated market making. Support cross-chain transactions and advanced DeFi protocols.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual visualization with holographic displays
tasks.requirements: Create advanced holographic ritual visualization system with 3D holographic displays and immersive experiences. Include spatial computing, gesture recognition, and multi-sensory feedback. Support next-generation display technologies.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual education with AI-powered tutoring
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced AI-powered tutoring system for ritual education and cultural learning. Include personalized learning paths, adaptive content, and intelligent assessment. Support multi-modal learning and cultural competency development.

tasks.task: Implement advanced ritual collaboration with real-time co-creation
tasks.requirements: Create advanced real-time collaboration system for ritual co-creation and community building. Include live editing, version control, and conflict resolution. Support multi-user collaboration and real-time communication.

tasks.task: Create advanced ritual preservation with quantum storage
tasks.requirements: Implement advanced quantum storage system for ritual preservation and cultural heritage protection. Include quantum encryption, quantum key distribution, and quantum-resistant archiving. Support future-proof cultural preservation.

tasks.task: Implement project completion and sustainability planning system
tasks.requirements: Create comprehensive sustainability planning system for long-term project maintenance and community governance. Include resource planning, community governance models, and sustainability metrics. Support project continuity and community ownership.

milestones.name: System Integration
milestones.description: Complete end-to-end system integration and testing
